title: Academic Literature Review Competency Enhancement Course in Digital Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory academic research methodologies and experience in digital information retrieval
context.additional_context: Designed for current secondary education practitioners, emphasizing the enhancement of academic literature review skills in linguistics. Conducted in an environment where digital devices (laptops/tablets) are provided.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically search for and evaluate relevant literature in academic databases within four weeks.
Learners can synthesize information by applying a literature analysis framework aligned with a specific research question.
Learners can write a literature review report following APA format and refine it based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
